t: AMAZON GETS AN ‘F’ FROM THE CARBON DISCLOSURE PROJECT | THE SEATTLE TIMES
s: November 2, 2016 - Many corporate giants have disclosed data on their carbon emissions to CDP, a high-profile nonprofit backed by big institutional investors. But Amazon doesn’t and is now the largest U.S. company by market value to refuse to answer CDP’s questions.
